meanings.definition: The state or quality of being splendid.
meanings.sent1: The splendidness of the sunset filled the sky with beauty.
meanings.sent2: Her dress sparkled with splendidness at the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat's splendidness in catching mice made the dog jealous.
meanings.sent4: The splendidness of the mountain peak took my breath away.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with the splendidness of colorful flowers.

meanings.definition: The quality of being magnificent or grand.
meanings.sent1: The splendidness of the palace impressed all visitors.
meanings.sent2: The splendidness of the fireworks display lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The chef's splendidness in creating desserts amazed the guests.
meanings.sent4: The splendidness of the waterfall's roar echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The splendidness of the king's crown symbolized his power and authority.

meanings.definition: The condition of being excellent or impressive.
meanings.sent1: The splendidness of her performance brought the audience to their feet.
meanings.sent2: The splendidness of the view from the top of the mountain was breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The splendidness of the cake made it the star of the party.
meanings.sent4: The splendidness of the orchestra's music filled the concert hall.
meanings.sent5: The splendidness of the athlete's speed won him the race.
